thread.title: The Beers of Summer: Hazy IPAs

author: William Bostwick
title: The Beers of Summer: Hazy IPAs
text:
DO NOT ADJUST your monitor. Those beers currently trending on Instagram look cloudy because theyâ€™re supposed to.
Known as hazy or New England IPAs, these brews offer drinkers turned off by the bitterness of other IPAs a smoother, fruitier alternative, thanks, in part, to the unfiltered yeasts that make them murky.
